title: Gabriel Boric - Wikipedia
snippet: Gabriel Borić Font (Spanish: [ɡaˈβɾjel ˈβoɾitʃ ˈfont]; born 11 February 1986) is a Chilean politician who has served as the 37th president of Chile since 2022. A socialist, he was previously a member of the Chamber of Deputies for two consecutive terms from 2014 to 2022.

title: Presidency: Gabriel Boric - Gob.cl
snippet: During his final years as a deputy, Chile experienced a great socio-political crisis, which exploded on October 18, 2019. Following weeks of widespread displays of social discontent, due to a series of actions and disaffections by politicians and businessmen, Gabriel Boric decided to sign the “Agreement for Social Peace and a New Constitution”.

title: Gabriel Boric, the Victory of the Pinochetist Far Right in Chile, and Donald Trump
snippet: But in all of this, there is a clear culprit: Chile’s current president, the leftist Gabriel Boric, incapable of delivering a single one of his major projects or transformation promises over four years.

title: Gabriel Boric - BBC News
snippet: Gabriel Boric, 35, says he will look after democracy after a convincing win over his far-right rival.
